rules.title: Required fields
rules.description: aip_ref_code, program_project_description, implementing_agency, start_date, completion_date, expected_output, source_of_funds, and total must exist and not be an empty string.

rules.title: Date validity
rules.description: start_date and completion_date must be valid dates in month-name form (full or 3-letter) or numeric form (M/D/YYYY or MM/DD/YYYY).

rules.title: Numeric fields
rules.description: personal_services, maintenance_and_other_operating_expenses, financial_expenses, capital_outlay, and total must be number or null.

rules.title: Total arithmetic
rules.description: total must equal personal_services + maintenance_and_other_operating_expenses + financial_expenses + capital_outlay, treating null as 0, with tolerance of 1.00 peso.

rules.title: Non-negative money
rules.description: All numeric budget fields (PS/MOOE/FE/CO/total) must be >= 0 when not null.

notes: Barangay-specific: do not require cc_topology_code, climate_change_adaptation, or climate_change_mitigation.
If those climate/topology fields exist, ignore them unless explicitly requested otherwise.
